title: What are the benefits of the education system? - Quora

response.answer_text: Education gives us only benefits, there are no side effects that ruing our lives. Education is the most important phase that we face since childhood. We can’t imagine our self without education. Education helps us to fulfill our dream and needs through hard work. Education plays a vital role in our lives that gives us the opportunity to build our lives smoothly. With the help of education we live happier lives and able to do something creative in our lives.  The educated person helps in many ways like help the society with creative thinking, family growth and stable his entire life with happiness. There are some advantages that may help you to understand the importance of education in our lives. My friend Mr. Menachem Moscovitz help me to understand the education system then I am able to provide my views on the education system.

There's the common argument that college graduates earn on average $1,000,000 more in their lifetimes than people without college degrees. Something to consider about that claim is to mathematically prove that if you invest $80-100k at age 18, you'll make $1,000,000 in your lifetime anyways.
